api.label: Download Policy Templates from Server
api.description: Retrieves DefensePro configuration templates from the APSolute Vision server.

api.label: Get Alerts
api.description: Retrieves APSolute Vision alerts (alerts from the APSolute Vision Alert Browser).Caution:  The  command  can  retrieve  alerts  only  from  the  newest  10,000  alerts  that  match  the  filtercriteria.  The  filter  criteria  and  the  rate  at  which  you  run  this  command  must  be  sufficiently  refinedand frequent so that the response contains fewer than 10,000 alerts.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Item ID (ormID) retrieved from the APSolute Vision server.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Item ID (ormID) retrieved from the APSolute Vision server.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Item ID (ormID) retrieved from the APSolute Vision server.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Item ID (ormID) retrieved from the APSolute Vision server.

api.label: Delete an Item from the Server
api.description:
Deletes an APSolute Vision item from the list.
Supported item types:
"user" - APSolute Vision local user. "deviceconfigurationfiles" - Device configuration file downloaded and stored on APSolute Vision. "alltemplates" - DefensePro configuration templates downloaded and stored on APSolute Vision.

pathParameters.name: item
pathParameters.description:
Supported item types:
"user" - APSolute Vision local user. "deviceconfigurationfiles" - Device configuration file downloaded and stored on APSolute Vision. "alltemplates" - DefensePro configuration templates downloaded and stored on APSolute Vision.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Item ID (ormID) retrieved from the APSolute Vision server.
